name: PIXELS
description:
PIXELS is the new way of pixel battles.

Features


  • One world canvas
Players from all over the world paint on one scalable canvas.

  • Watch where the players are
Press TAB to see all the cursors. And other additional data.

  • SUPER PIXELS
The brand-new animated pixels.


  • Not just ONE pixel
You get a limit of 100 pixels and 10 super pixels. Cooldown depends on number of players.


  • Quick paint mode
Just press SHIFT and create.


  • Community features
Teams, users and ratings with leaderboard.


Share your art to the world.
